languages.text: Ирлиэт известно о том, что уцелевшие эльдары с Крудараха объединили остатки сил. Однако вынужденное соседство людей и ксеносов в Просторе Коронус не сулит ничего хорошего обоим видам. Лорд-капитану снова придется вмешаться в дела эльдаров.

Yrliet knows that the surviving Crudarach Aeldari have united their remaining forces. However, forced proximity between humans and xenos in the Koronus Expanse does not bode well for either species. The Lord Captain will once again have to intervene in the affairs of the Aeldari.
languages.original_text: Ирлиэт известно о том, что уцелевшие эльдары с Крудараха объединили остатки сил. Однако вынужденное соседство людей и ксеносов в Просторе Коронус не сулит ничего хорошего обоим видам. Лорд-капитану снова придется вмешаться в дела эльдаров.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet and the Lord Captain have discovered that the surviving Crudarach Aeldari have united their remaining forces. However, forced proximity between humans and xenos in the Koronus Expanse does not bode well for either species. The Lord Captain will once again have to intervene in the affairs of the Aeldari.

Yrliet and the Lord Captain have discovered that the surviving Crudarach Aeldari have united their remaining forces. However, forced proximity between humans and xenos in the Koronus Expanse does not bode well for either species. The Lord Captain will once again have to intervene in the affairs of the Aeldari.

Yrliet and the Lord Captain have discovered that the surviving Crudarach Aeldari have united their remaining forces. However, forced proximity between humans and xenos in the Koronus Expanse does not bode well for either species. The Lord Captain will once again have to intervene in the affairs of the Aeldari.

Yrliet knows that the surviving Crudarach Aeldari have united their remaining forces. However, forced proximity between humans and xenos in the Koronus Expanse does not bode well for either species. The Lord Captain will once again have to intervene in the affairs of the Aeldari.

Yrliet knows that the surviving Crudarach Aeldari have united their remaining forces. However, forced proximity between humans and xenos in the Koronus Expanse does not bode well for either species. The Lord Captain will once again have to intervene in the affairs of the Aeldari.

languages.text: Yrliet sait que les survivants de Crudarach ont uni leurs forces. Cependant, cette proximité forcée entre humains et xénos dans les Étendues de Koronus ne présage rien de bon, pour aucune des deux espèces. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} va à nouveau devoir intervenir dans les affaires des Aeldaris.
languages.original_text: Yrliet knows that the surviving Crudarach Aeldari have united their remaining forces. However, forced proximity between humans and xenos in the Koronus Expanse does not bode well for either species. The Lord Captain will once again have to intervene in the affairs of the Aeldari.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet et {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ont découvert que les survivants de Crudarach avaient uni leurs forces. Cependant, cette proximité forcée entre humains et xénos dans les Étendues de Koronus ne présage rien de bon, pour aucune des deux espèces. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} va à nouveau devoir intervenir dans les affaires des Aeldaris.

languages.text: 伊莉耶特意识到，克鲁达拉赫残存的幸存者集结了所有残余力量。若是人类与艾达灵族在科罗努斯扩区再次接触，这无论是对人类还是对艾达灵族，恐怕都不是件好事。因此，行商浪人不得不再次介入艾达灵族的事务。
languages.original_text: Yrliet knows that the surviving Crudarach Aeldari have united their remaining forces. However, forced proximity between humans and xenos in the Koronus Expanse does not bode well for either species. The Lord Captain will once again have to intervene in the affairs of the Aeldari.

traits.locale_text: 伊莉耶特与行商浪人发现，克鲁达拉赫残存的幸存者集结了所有残余力量。若是人类与艾达灵族在科罗努斯扩区再次接触，这无论是对人类还是对艾达灵族，恐怕都不是件好事。因此，行商浪人不得不再次介入艾达灵族的事务。

languages.text: ユリエットは、生き残ったクルダラのアエルダリが生き残りの勢力を結集したことを知っている。しかし、コロヌス・エクスパンスで人類と異種族が直接対峙するのはどちらの種族にとっても好ましいことではない。ロード・キャプテンは再びアエルダリの問題へ介入することを余儀なくされる。
languages.original_text: Yrliet knows that the surviving Crudarach Aeldari have united their remaining forces. However, forced proximity between humans and xenos in the Koronus Expanse does not bode well for either species. The Lord Captain will once again have to intervene in the affairs of the Aeldari.

traits.locale_text: ユリエットは、生き残ったクルダラのアエルダリが生き残りの勢力を結集したことを知っている。しかし、コロヌス・エクスパンスで人類と異種族が直接対峙するのはどちらの種族にとっても好ましいことではない。ロード・キャプテンは再びアエルダリの問題へ介入することを余儀なくされる。

languages.text: Yrliet weiß, dass die überlebenden Aeldari von Crudarach ihre verbleibenden Truppen zusammengelegt haben. Die erzwungene Nähe zwischen Menschen und Xenos in der Koronus-Ausdehnung verheißt jedoch für beide Spezies nichts Gutes. Der Lord Captain wird sich erneut in die Angelegenheiten der Aeldari einschalten müssen.
languages.original_text: Yrliet knows that the surviving Crudarach Aeldari have united their remaining forces. However, forced proximity between humans and xenos in the Koronus Expanse does not bode well for either species. The Lord Captain will once again have to intervene in the affairs of the Aeldari.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet und der Lord Captain haben festgestellt, dass die überlebenden Aeldari von Crudarach ihre verbleibenden Truppen zusammengelegt haben. Die erzwungene Nähe zwischen Menschen und Xenos in der Koronus-Ausdehnung verheißt jedoch für beide Spezies nichts Gutes. Der Lord Captain wird sich erneut in die Angelegenheiten der Aeldari einschalten müssen.

languages.text: Yrliet sabe que los Aeldari supervivientes de Crudarach han unido las fuerzas que les quedan. Sin embargo, la proximidad forzosa entre xenos y humanos en la Extensión de Koronus no pinta nada bien para ambas especies. Una vez más, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se verá envuelt{mf|o|a} en los asuntos de los Aeldari.
languages.original_text: Yrliet knows that the surviving Crudarach Aeldari have united their remaining forces. However, forced proximity between humans and xenos in the Koronus Expanse does not bode well for either species. The Lord Captain will once again have to intervene in the affairs of the Aeldari.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet y {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán han descubierto que los Aeldari supervivientes de Crudarach han unido las fuerzas que les quedan. Sin embargo, la proximidad forzosa entre xenos y humanos en la Extensión de Koronus no pinta nada bien para ambas especies. Una vez más, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se verá envuelt{mf|o|a} en los asuntos de los Aeldari.

languages.text: Yrliet, sağ kalan Crudarach Aeldarilerinin geri kalan kuvvetlerinin toplandığını biliyor. Fakat Koronus Enginliği'nde insanlar ve zenolar arasındaki zorunlu yakınlık, iki türe de iyi gelmiyor. Lord Kaptan, bir kez daha Aeldari meselelerine dâhil olmak zorunda kalacak.
languages.original_text: Yrliet knows that the surviving Crudarach Aeldari have united their remaining forces. However, forced proximity between humans and xenos in the Koronus Expanse does not bode well for either species. The Lord Captain will once again have to intervene in the affairs of the Aeldari.
